title: The One About Black History Month
description:
This week on Sibling Rivalry, Bob and Monét share their thoughts on Whoopi Goldberg getting suspended from The View, they reflect on how Black History Month was taught to them growing up, and they discuss the erasure of queerness throughout Black history. Tune in to learn about the iconicness that was Harriet Tubman and hear Bob and Monét's excitement about the casting of The Color Purple movie musical!!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
